column5: Whats the size limit for uploading pictures to the gallery? Tried yesterday and kept getting the "photo is too big" message. Also, what is a good FREE program for resizing images? Thanks for the help.
Sign up to photobucket... it is simple and easy to use... after you have uploaded your pics to photobucket copy and paste your image code here... presto bango..  www.photobucket.com  G
What Gerritt said.  Photobucket even resizes for you when you upload.  It's the hosting site that all the coolest kids are using!!!
I use shrinkpictures.com to resize and myfishingpictures.com for image hosting. Both pretty simple to use.
Read this older thread...has step by step instructions on how to use photobucket.  Good luck!  http://www.ofncommunity.com/forums/index.php?showtopic=20729

I guess I'm not cool because I use Flickr to store my pics and then link to them in my post.  Same thing as Photobucket I guess. I was already using Flickr before I joined here.  I never was one of the "cool kids".
